word: G3075 - λυμαίνομαι - lymaínomai - loo-mah'-ee-nom-ahee - Make havock of

sections.paragraph: 1. to affix a stigma to, to dishonor, spot, defile
2. to treat shamefully to ravage, devastate, ruin
ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: Middle voice from a probable derivative of G3089 (meaning filth); properly to soil, that is, (figuratively) insult (maltreat): - make havock of.
